title: VLAŽILNA KREMA, BASIC, GREEN LINE, 100 ML

product-info.opis: Vlažilna krema Green Line Basic kožo intenzivno vlaži, neguje in ščiti. Aktivne učinkovine iz jabolka kožo intenzivno vlažijo, zmanjšujejo izgubo vode, ožijo po...

ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA, GLYCERIN, CYCLOMETHICONE, DIMETHICONE, DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, CETEARETH-20, CETEARETH-12, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, CETYL PALMITATE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, PYRUS MALUS (APPLE) FRUIT EXTRACT, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, SORBITOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, SODIUM LACTATE, LACTIC ACID, SERINE, TEA-LACTATE, UREA, SODIUM CHLORIDE, ALLANTOIN, CARBOMER, TRIETHANOLAMINE, IMIDAZOLIDINYL UREA, METHYLPARABEN, ETHYLPARABEN, BUTYLPARABEN, PROPYLPARABEN, ISOBUTYLPARABEN, PARFUM, CI 42090, CI 19140, CI 28440, CI 42051.
